    Class
    Description
    DescriptionBasedDiff
    Implementation of a Diff that performs the modifications that are passed to its DescriptionBasedDiff.onDescribed(Description) method, with no formatting.
    Diff
    All the differences to be applied to a source file to be applied in a refactoring.

    Represents an import.
